 Discover the truth behind an enigmatic AI striving to reach the
 Singularity, a theoretical event horizon in which artificial
 intelligence will surpass human intelligence and all bets about the
 future will be off. How will you play your part in the story?
 Explore the futuristic city of Harbor Prime and meet its many
 inhabitants, answer the challenges the city has to offer, roam the
 neon-lit streets, and augment your character with skills and
 implants.

 For more info go to : http://store.steampowered.com/app/269650/

 1. Extract release 
 2. Mount ISO
 3. Install the game
 4. Copy crack from the PLAZA folder
 5. Play!
 
 Notes: The Enhanced Edition of Dex includes:
 
 > Manual saves anytime during gameplay 
 > New user interface and better support for gamepad 
 > Improved enemy AI 
 > Revamped AR and Cyberspace modes 
 > The possibility to use weapons while walking and crouching 
 > Support for Steam Achievements, Trading Cards and Badges 
 > German, French and Hungarian localization 
 > Better audio and sound effects 
 > Multiple other fixes and improvements
 
 General Notes:

 - Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from 
 trying to go online ..
 - If you install games to your systemdrive, it may be necessary
 to run this game with admin privileges instead
